name: Micro Pico
description:
I made this game for Low Rez Jam 2016 where the goal was to make a 64x64 game. I figured that was too many pixels so I made a collection of 20x20 microgames instead! I made one game a day for two weeks, April 1st - 14th.

The games just use the arrow keys, Z and sometimes X. Games get harder with each level and unfortunately a lot of them will become impossibly difficult - balancing 14 games is pretty time consuming!

Things I'd like to add when I have time:

  • Menu music
  • Level win/fail music
  • In-game music which speeds up with the gameplay
  • Sound effects for all the games
  • Practice mode for trying each game

Here's the PICO-8 forum thread for this game.
